title: Strengthening HR Management Competencies: MOOC Platform Utilizing Ontology-Based Automated Assessment Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operational principles of ontology-based automated assessment systems on MOOC platforms.
Learners can structure content and design assessment items using domain ontologies in science fields.
Learners can perform simulation/VR-based learning activities in smartphone environments and utilize automated feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
